  labels = {["static"]}>
Write TAPI text file contents into stream.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="OS">Stream to write to.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="File">Library attributes to write as text file.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FileKind">File format to write text file as. If not specified, it will read from File.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Compact">Whether to limit whitespace in text file.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>
